elements.text: Nope, not really. You'd have to create your own theme, which is possible but not entirely straightforward.

text: What I do is to copy the docs/build/assets/themes/*.css files to docs/src/assets/themes/ , then edit the two .css files (eg documenter-dark.css) to change the fonts. See for example at <https://github.com/JuliaGraphics/ColorSchemeTools.jl|https://github.com/JuliaGraphics/ColorSchemeTools.jl>. It's a bit of a pain, but will do until something better turns up.
